channel.title: Help!items for staff only!help!
channel.description: how do i make an item that i made for staff only?? i have custom staff capes and i wanna make them for the staff only! help!

item.title: Help!items for staff only!help!
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

this is easy to do just search for this code

/* Equipment level checking*/

and you should see under it.

if (ItemID == 10704) { return 100; }

now just copy that and paste above or below doesnt matter change the id and add rights onto it.

return 100 is the lvl u need for it just make that 1000 and have staff rights on the item. witch for a non staff to weild they would need 1000 attack or rights of 1. otherwise they cant use.

Read full topic
